discussion.content: Agree with Stefan..."These cloud services include Power BI, PowerApps, Power Automate, Azure Analysis Services, and AzureLogic Apps."

questions.question_text:
You have a SharePoint Server farm and a Microsoft 365 subscription.
You plan to deploy the On-premises data gateway.
Which three cloud services can use the gateway to access SharePoint data? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content: Data Box is ideally suited to transfer data sizes larger than 40 TBs in scenarios with no to limited network connectivity

questions.question_text:
You have a SharePoint Server farm and a SharePoint Online subscription.
The farm contains the lists shown in the following table.
//IMG//

Which two lists can you migrate to SharePoint Online by using the SharePoint Migration Tool? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

You have a SharePoint Server farm and a Microsoft 365 subscription.
You plan to migrate some SharePoint sites to SharePoint Online.
You need to identify users who have access to your SharePoint Server on-premises environment and are NOT mapped to a Microsoft Azure Active Directory
(Azure AD) account.
What should you use?

discussion.content: SMIT.exe - Performs identity mapping work for both SharePoint 2010 and 2013 environments.

Identity Mapping
Identity Mapping allows you to generate a report of all the user and group identities that have access to your SharePoint environment and attempts to map those identities to Azure AD user and group identities.This process is very important to migration. If identities are not properly set up prior to migration, it can result in users losing access to content as well as information being incorrect in the site. For example, the Created By and Modified fields will not show the correct identity post migration.

comments.content: Download the assessment tool to a computer in your SharePoint farm. To download, go here: SharePoint Migration Assessment Tool

discussion.content: SharePoint Migration Identity Mapping Tool is not the same as SharePoint Migration Assessment Tool.

choices.E: From site settings, run site collection upgrade.
choices.F: Run the Upgrade-SPContentDatabase cmdlet for the content database of the site collection.
choices.C: From site settings, view audit log reports.

discussion.content:
I thought it should be A too:

The Test-SPSite cmdlet runs one or all site collection health checks on the site collection and its contents. This cmdlet reports the rules which were run and provides a summary of the results.

Answer should be A. The SharePoint Migration Tool does not give you an option to pre-check the source site. Should use the SharePoint Migration Assessment Tool for farm-wide pre-checks.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/sharepoint-server/test-spsite?view=sharepoint-ps
